sense.def: Alternative Names xian yong 涎壅 , saliva obstruction.

Illness Sign of large quantities of phlegm present in the respiratory tracts evidenced by sounds produced during in- and exhalation. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 6: 治卒中風，涎潮發搐 , 金 虎丹方 , “To cure sudden wind stroke, saliva upsurge and convulsions, [use] the recipe for the Golden Tiger Elixir”. Xian chi 癇瘛 , epilepsy with spasms [1]

Pathological Condition Combined Designation of xian bing 癇病 and chi bing 瘛病 , convulsion disease. Shang han zhi ge 傷寒直格 Middle juan Recipe Entry yi yuan san 益元散 , powder to augment the original [qi] ：主癇瘛驚悸健 忘 , “It controls epilepsy with spasms , fear with palpitation, and forgetfulness”.
